Newbie Guide: *A novice character* is one who is new to the world ofLineage II. Certain benefits are available to novice characters up to level 62. Taxes and other charges have led to a steep increase in prices for armor and weaponry. To help offset this problem, *novice characters can exchange their used gear for full credit towards the purchase of new equipment* inany weapon or armor shop.Also, the threat of monsters may be overwhelming fornovice characters. I help them as much as possible.. *Come and see me for support magic that is appropriate for your level.* This will help build the confidence you'll need to challenge the powerful monsters in this world. [npc_%objectId%_Link newbiehelper/guide-13.htm|View the list of assist magics] Thirdly, *Soulshots and Spiritshot for Novices will be given in addition.* A novice character can receive additional Soulshots and Spiritshot for novices if he completes a particular quest.The information for this quest will be provided later. And lastly, occasionally players find that they wish to change the race or class of their character. *Novicecharacter benefits may be passed to a new character upto level 6.* However, once a character reaches level 6,then only that character receives benefits as a novice.
